p.seg: Letter not found; item is a register entry only dated 15 June 1876, of a letter dated 7 June.
[Proposed Circular for State Schools re collecting plants]

p.style: font-family: Athens, 'Times New Roman'; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: M's letter was forwarded to the Minister for Education on 16 June minuted: 'For careful considn & if apped to direct circulars to be sent to the various State Schools’'
This letter should be looked for in the Education Dept files at PRO.
